name: Envy
description:
Made With Envy is an Orlando-based web consultancy that’s been building software since 2009. We’re a specialized, flexible team of experts that seek out hard web application problems to partner on. Through our work in developer education, and a desire to teach the technologies we employ, we've founded Code School (sold to Pluralsight in 2015) and IvyApp.
Companies like Cisco and Booz Allen Hamilton have utilized Envy's expertise to build their own learning platforms, training skills like networking and data science. Each member of Envy is senior level in their discipline and passionate to produce the best possible end product. We'd love to chat about your idea.
READ MORE...
